Text: RE HiHey Good to hear from you Yes it is sad about Randa but we are all thinking about her and praying for her I hope she found a job by now I think she was laid off during Q lay offs Her husband is still working her so that is good at least one of them still has a job at least Meghan I forgot her name already I bet she is a cutie I just saw my niece in Colorado Springs it was her rd birthday this past Sunday so I got to celebrate it with her We had a party for her and I dont think I saw so many and year olds in my life They kept wanting to eat something anything Are kids always that hungry It was hilarious I cant believe she is talking in complete sentences either Im shocked at how time really flies by Yes it seems just like yesterday she was born I think that is neat that Kellyn my niece and Meghan are close in age Ill have to be sure to remember that No huge vacations for usmy husband and I bought a house in Magnolia May month before I got laid off so all our money has been going into the house for the past year I bet you didnt know about it because I dont think they gave me a chance to say goodbye to anyone when they let us go Im wondering did you even know I got laid off I cant remember anymore Its been such a long time Besides the Colorado trip I just took we are going to Connecticut next week for my husbands family reunion so it will be nice to be in cool weather again How about you guys Are you still the jetsetters of Houston I know we probably wont see each other but Marilyn and I talk about you once in a while and how much fun and interesting you were If ever you are in the neighborhood please give us a call and we would love to see you okay Take care Poli Shachov GAP Marcom Professionals built the Titanic Amateurs built the ark Unknown Original Message From Lokay Michelle mailtoMichelle NRONcom Sent Tuesday July PM To Shachov Poli Subject RE Hi Hi I am doing terrific I would have written sooner but I just got back from a business trip I do miss the old lunch ganghow are things going Which group are you guys in now Randa told me she had received a severance package and is currently looking for a job Sounds like a lot of people have left Thanks for asking about Meghan thats so sweet Can you believe she is about to turn in a couple of weeks Hows your niece the one that is the same age Doesnt it seem like just yesterday that she was born Have you guys been on more terrific vacations Email me detailstalk soon Original Message From Shachov Poli mailtoPoli OMPAQcom Sent Thursday July PM To Lokay Michelle Subject Hi Remember me Marilyn Rice and I were talking about our old group and your name came up We are both wondering how you are so I decided to shoot you an email We would love to hear how you are and how you little girl is doing etc We miss seeing you Take care ps Poli Shachov GAP Marcom Professionals built the Titanic Amateurs built the ark Unknown This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you
